title: Rotten Tomatoes Cloned 2014-12-04
description: Rotten Tomatoes offers the most comprehensive collection of movie and TV reviews from professional critics. The world famous Tomatometer rating represents the percentage of professional reviews that are positive for a given film or television show and is often cited as the "tie breaker" among decision-challenged couples worldwide. Users may browse movies according to their release schedules in theaters and on DVD.
